driver.ui:help: ODBC Driver to use for Server and Port connection method.

dbms.ui:help: Defines DSN DBMS flavour for side panel and autocompletion only.

oracleTableOptions.ui:help: Side panel Tables source (dba_tables, all_tables, user_tables)

oracleViewOptions.ui:help: Side panel Tables source (dba_views, all_views, user_views)

inaccessibleDatabase.ui:help: Display empty or inaccessible databases in side panel.

inaccessibleSchema.ui:help: Display empty or inaccessible schemas in side panel.
